meanings.definition: A type of adhesive material that hardens when mixed with a curing agent.
meanings.sent1: The epoxies were used to fix the broken vase.
meanings.sent2: She bought different epoxies for her art project.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat got stuck in the spilled epoxies.
meanings.sent4: His determination was as strong as the bond of epoxies.
meanings.sent5: The smell of epoxies lingered in the workshop.

meanings.definition: Plural form of epoxy, referring to multiple instances of the adhesive material.
meanings.sent1: Epoxies are versatile for various DIY projects.
meanings.sent2: The store sells different epoxies for different purposes.
meanings.sent3: The kids mistook the epoxies for colorful candies.
meanings.sent4: Their friendship was as strong as the bond of epoxies.
meanings.sent5: The shelves were stocked with various epoxies for customers to choose from.
